post:
Hi there,
I just received my OneplusOne invitation and I don't need it anymore but being the ***hole I am I want to use this situation to gain me some fun by getting a new family member for my allready existing vps :-)

If you can provide me a vps fore 1 year than the invitation is yours. The vps should be at least comparable to a LES box but of course I also would appreciate a vps which is comparable to the 15 dollar yearly plan of crissic.

All locations except France, UK and Germany are welcome.

Offer will end in four hours.
